{"step_by_step_thinking": "The sphenoidal sinus is one of the paranasal sinuses. It is located within the body of the sphenoid bone, behind the nasal cavity and below the pituitary gland. The nerve supply to the sphenoidal sinus is from the posterior ethmoidal nerve, which is a branch of the ophthalmic division of the trigeminal nerve.", "answer_choice": "A. Posterior ethmoidal"}
